backend/main.mo: Actor that mixes in blob storage capabilities using MixinStorage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing OG image update tasks, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: High-level summaries of all major frontend source files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables and dark theme behavior.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file defining metadata, OG/Twitter tags, favicons, and main script mount.
frontend/OG_PREVIEW_VERIFICATION.md: Instructions for verifying OG/Twitter previews and troubleshooting OG image issues.
frontend/public/.ic-assets.json5: Asset canister rules specifying headers and caching for OG images and other public files.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Domain list for IC canister domain configuration.
frontend/public/.well-known/ii-alternati: Defines alternative origins for Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/public/site.webmanifest: Web app manifest describing icons, theme, and PWA metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component applying dark theme and rendering the LandingPage inside an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches render/runtime errors and provides a reload option.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveBackg: Canvas-based background that generates and animates a responsive mesh reacting to mouse and touch input.
frontend/src/components/PersonalModeCont: Scrollable personal-mode page with lazy-loaded background, section fade-ins, and a carousel hint triggered by intersection observers.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalMode: Professional-mode page handling scroll-triggered animations, background preload, timeline effects, and interactive role/ecosystem sections.
frontend/src/components/ProjectCard.tsx: Clickable project card that opens a detailed overlay with text, images, links, and an optional YouTube embed plus a horizontal image carousel.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useModeSelectorRemeas: Hook that increments a counter when window or element sizes change, enabling components to remeasure layouts.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder query hook that waits for the actor and provides space for future backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH CSS variables plus custom styles and animations for mode selectors and base UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Implements the animated landing page with mode switching, image preloading, audio feedback, and timed transitions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, extended theming, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, issues, and feature requests related to fixing and updating OG image assets.
